description:
Richard is a shrewd jeweller who has customers worldwide. He is often described as a "Living jewel" due to his incompatible beauty. Also, Richard is a polyglot who speaks fluent Japanese; even better than native Japanese people.
He offered Seigi a part-time job when opening "Jewelry Etranger", his jewellery store in Ginza.
He is an extremist when it comes to Royal milk tea and is also an acknowledged sweets junkie.
name: Richard Ranashinha de Vulpian
